Package com.stormpath.sdk.account

Interface Summary
Account An Account is a unique identity within a Directory.
AccountCriteria An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
AccountList A CollectionResource containing Account instances.
AccountOptions<T> Account-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Account resources.
CreateAccountRequest Represents an attempt to create a new Account record in Stormpath.
CreateAccountRequestBuilder A Builder to construct CreateAccountRequests.
EmailVerificationToken  
PasswordResetToken  
 

Class Summary
Accounts Static utility/helper methods for working with Account resources.
 

Enum Summary
AccountStatus An AccountStatus represents the various states an account may be in.
